EmailTemplate.subject: Free Tool Friday: VMT-Shirts Return | I Do Not Fear SAN People
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Limited Edition Autumn 2014 VMT-Shirt
<http://vmturbo.com/request-vmturbo-shirt/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetoolfriday&utm_content=100314> Now for a limited time, you can score a FREE "I Do Not Fear SAN People" t-shirt by downloading and deploying a 30-Day Trial of VMTurbo Operations Manager, the world's only unified control system for cloud and virtual environments. The trial downloads and deploys in just 15 minutes, providing specific workload sizing, placement, and provisioning recommendations to drive your environment to its desired state within the first hour. <http://vmturbo.com/request-vmturbo-shirt/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetoolfriday&utm_content=100314>
Awesome technology. Awesome t-shirt. Awesome you. <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetoolfriday&utm_content=092614> Learn More <http://vmturbo.com/request-vmturbo-shirt/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=freetoolfriday&utm_content=100314> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
